exercises.name: Mountain Pose
exercises.tip: Engage your quads, rotate your thighs inward, and let your arms hang naturally.

exercises.name: Downward Facing Dog
exercises.tip: Keep both toes pointed towards the front of your mat and sink your heels toward the floor.

exercises.name: Cobra Pose
exercises.tip: Root into your feet and lift your chest without pressing too hard with your hands.

exercises.name: Tree Pose
exercises.tip: Focus on a point ahead to maintain balance and engage your core.

meditation.name: Full Awareness
meditation.tip: Focus on your breath and body sensations.

exercises.name: Warrior II
exercises.tip: Extend your arms fully and gaze over your front hand.

exercises.name: Seated Forward Bend
exercises.tip: Bend at your hips, not your waist, and keep your neck aligned.

exercises.name: Bridge Pose
exercises.tip: Root into your feet and lift your hips gently.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.tip: Rest your forehead on the ground and breathe deeply.

meditation.name: Mindful Breathing
meditation.tip: Maintain a steady breath rhythm and relax your mind.

exercises.name: Sun Salutation
exercises.tip: Flow smoothly with your breath, keeping movements coordinated.

exercises.name: Half Moon Pose
exercises.tip: Keep your standing leg strong and gaze upward if comfortable.

exercises.name: Camel Pose
exercises.tip: Lift your chest and avoid straining your neck.

exercises.name: Lotus Pose
exercises.tip: Sit with a straight spine, using props if your hips are tight.

exercises.name: Corpse Pose
exercises.tip: Lie flat, relax completely, and focus on stillness.

meditation.name: Complete Relaxation
meditation.tip: Let go of all tension and rest deeply.

exercises.tip: Root into your front foot and engage your glutes.

exercises.tip: Use blocks to raise the floor if hamstrings are tight.

exercises.tip: Reach for the sky while rooting down with your feet.

meditation.name: Energy Centering
meditation.tip: Visualize energy flowing from your core outward.

exercises.tip: Focus on a point ahead to maintain balance and engage your core.

exercises.name: Plank Pose
exercises.tip: Keep your hips and spine in a neutral position.

exercises.name: Eagle Pose
exercises.tip: Wrap your arms and legs tightly and focus on a steady gaze.

meditation.tip: Concentrate on your breath, counting each inhale and exhale.

meditation.tip: Feel rooted to the earth with each breath.
